2.post_text:
Thank you all for the overwhelming support for today's Tumbler Card personalizing session with Band of Doodlers. We're maxed out today at Suntec City. 

You can still join us on 20 Sept and 11 October at our stores at Plaza Singapura and Fullerton Waterboat House to have your Tumbler Cards designed by local artists. Details in the link below.

Gotten mine last Sunday and think that Starbucks Singapore has a very smart marketing to keep coming out new idea to attracts sales. Well done. 
However, think Starbucks Singapore has super lousy internal communication system that almost all the promotion details are not well communicated from the marketing team to the barista on counter. In fact, customer has to explain to the barista instead ( eg, hubby had to told a Starbucks manager that the security code for the tumbler card is at the reverse side of the tumbler card insert. Also, I have to explain to 3 barista one after another and show them the Starbucks website for telling them there is 50cents rebate for purchase of any beverage if using the iOS mobile apps without the physical tumbler, still they still don't seems to agree that there is rebate without the physical tumbler. There are a few other cases too)
I guess the barista these days need to be more passionate to the Starbucks products.
Caroline Tiong
Charmaine Hubilla
Faisal Maun

Hi can i clarify something? My friend recently received a free drink voucher with his tumbler. However.. I just got a second tumbler yesterday and i didnt get any voucher with either of my two tumblers.

I already purchase my Tumbler few days back, do I just purchase a beverage on the day to get a Q number for the first 50 people. How will you all issues the Q at 2pm sharp or can we be there early to purchase to get our Tumbler design?

When I purchase the tumbler, I asked if my purchase transactions using the tumbler-card can be accumulated together with my main card as one account usage so as to qualify for the conversion to a 'Gold member' and they said yes so long as I register the tumbler-card into my existing account.. However,  I have also email to enquire and was disappointed to find out that transactions made stands alone by individual card and not by the total spending using both cards as one account holder.. I felt cheated as barista has confirmed that it was allowed before I purchase the tumbler-card and I could not link both cards together as one when I log on to my starbucks card account and send my queries only to receive such disappointing truths.. I'm sure many cardholders who has also purchased the tumbler-card like me will be as disappointed if they read this and those who are considering to get the tumbler-card will changes their mind knowing this.. Pls make flexible adjustments..
Huining Tan WANNA GO
Hey I know that this is a separate card from the Starbucks Card, but can they be registered under the same account(email etc)?

Join us at our store this weekend and let our artists bring your Tumbler Cards to life with personalized art crafted just for you. Details in the link below.

Hey Vanessa and Randyce,

This Tumbler Card can be acquired for $80 with the full value being credited to it for spending at Starbucks. :)

Hi there Thomas 郑春和 and Lester Bo,

The Tumbler Card acts as a regular Starbucks Card. Any expenditure on this will still contribute to your rising up our membership levels. Like a Starbucks Card, we would need you to register it for us to track your progress.

You can scan the barcode in stores for your transactions and for registration purposes, the 16 digit Card number and security numbers are listed next to the barcode and on the back of the insert respectively.
Seokhui Tan Huifen Ong Pearlynn Xuezhen

12.post_text:
Perfect iced coffee at home: 

1. Grind coffee to a "cone grind" (fine grind)
2. Pour 16 Tbsp coffee into pour-over iced coffee brewer 
3. Pour 24 oz hot water (200°F) over ground coffee
4. Fill pitcher with ice
5. Enjoy!

Hey Orange Foo and Nicholas Tan,

We're sorry if the points were not properly accumulated on your Starbucks Card. Could you kindly reach out to our Card team at card@starbucks.com.sg with your 16 digit Card number? We will investigate this issue for you and correct any errors our system might have committed.

17.post_text:
Celebrate an age-old celestial tradition with family and friends over divine, timeless mooncakes. http://bit.ly/starbucksmooncakes

Available in traditional white lotus paste with yolk, Starbucks coffee white lotus paste with caramel, Starbucks green tea white lotus paste with black sesame and white lotus paste with cranberry and macadamia.
